class.name: hqp_controllers/HQPVelocityController
class.description: The HQPVelocityController generates velocity commands for a set of joints. It expects a VelocityJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: hqp_controllers/HQPEffortController
class.description: The HQPEffortController generates the same velocity commands as above, but also includes velocity tracking for a set of joints and outputs efforts. Thus, it expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
